home.connect_prompt: Please ensure your HSLink device is properly connected to your computer, then click the refresh button to search again.

device_setting.title: Device settings
device_setting.connect_warning: Please connect the device on the Home page first, then proceed with settings
device_setting.nickname_desc: Set a display name for the device to help identify multiple devices
device_setting.speed_boost_desc: Debug 10 times faster, but use with care as the high speed may cause communication errors

port_mode.spi_desc: SPI Mode: The actual speed matches the set speed, and the waveform is more standardized
port_mode.gpio_desc: GPIO Mode: The actual speed may be lower, but compatibility is improved. Use this mode if communication errors occur

device_setting.jtag_shift_desc: By enabling this, JTAG operation speed is increased but compatibility issue can occur on some devices
device_setting.jtag_20pin_desc: When enabled, UART functionality is disabled and all outputs are set low to prevent overheating caused by grounding on some devices
device_setting.power_on_desc: When enabled, TVcc is turned on by default and the output voltage matches the reference voltage
device_setting.power_on_desc2: When disabled, TVcc remains off until the voltage on the Vref pin exceeds 1.6V, then it turns on
device_setting.io_on_desc: When enabled, all IOs are activated by default with levels matching the reference voltage
device_setting.io_on_desc2: When disabled, all IOs remain off (high impedance) until the voltage on the Vref pin exceeds 1.6V, then they turn on
device_setting.voltage_placeholder: Enter a voltage value between 1.8V and 5.0V
device_setting.voltage_range_desc: Please enter a voltage value between 1.8V and 5.0V
device_setting.external_vref_desc: The device uses the voltage on the Vref pin as the reference level
device_setting.voltage_select_desc: Select the appropriate reference voltage corresponding to the target device's operating voltage

voltage_errors.too_low: Voltage value cannot be lower than 1.8V

device_setting.reset_multi_select: Multiple reset modes can be selected simultaneously

reset_mode.por_desc: After triggering the reset, TVcc and +5V outputs will be turned off, then re-enabled after the reset is complete
reset_mode.arm_swd_soft_desc: This option is only available on ARM-based chips

device_setting.reset_desc: Choose different reset methods based on your target device's characteristics; multiple methods can be combined in complex situations
device_setting.led_desc: Control the on/off status of the device's LED indicator
device_setting.led_brightness_desc: Adjust the LED indicator's brightness; lower brightness may extend the device's lifespan

alert.fail: Failed to save settings, please try again

device_upgrade.title: Device upgrade
device_upgrade.connect_prompt: Please connect a device on the Home page before performing the upgrade operation

bootloader.title: Bootloader
bootloader.version_required: App firmware version 2.4.0 or higher is required to upgrade the Bootloader

setting.title: Settings
setting.menu_collapsed_desc: When enabled, the menu will be collapsed when the application starts
setting.restart_required: Some settings require restarting the application to take effect

members.halfsweet: Hardware Design / Firmware Development / Host Software
